about_the_game:
This is the soundtrack for the new levels for kuso.

kuso Original Soundtrack Volume 2
• A full 16 track soundtrack composed by James Bennett. Comes in 320kbps MP3 format with a runtime of about 49 minutes.

kuso Original Soundtrack Volume 2 Demos
• A 16 track album of early versions and unused tunes from the game. Comes in 320kbps MP3 format with a runtime of about 44 minutes.

Soundtrack Tracklist (Runtime: 48:23)
01 - Nocturne
02 - Jellyfish
03 - Nebula
04 - Kid
05 - Tofu
06 - Miniature
07 - Apex
08 - Gadget
09 - Jetset
10 - Lumen
11 - Nickel
12 - Suburb
13 - Galactic
14 - Kismet
15 - Kingpin
16 - Metric

Soundtrack Volume 2 Demos (Runtime: 43:43)
01 - Zoom (Unused)
02 - Highly Strung (Unused)
03 - Beach Booch (Jellyfish Demo)
04 - whammyyy (Tofu Demo)
05 - Howler (Unused)
06 - littlebitofeverything (Nebula & Metric Demos)
07 - Mystery Cops (Unused)
08 - Saturday Carnival (Metric Demo)
09 - Sunday Ghosts
10 - Tuesday Drift (Unused)
11 - Tuesday Galaxy (Glactic Demo)
12 - Tuesday Landcape (Kismet Demo)
13 - Wednesday Twilight (Lumen Demo)
14 - Spacecraft (Apex Demo)
15 - Suburb (69bpm Version)
16 - Kismet (69bpm Version)
